title: SonicWall security advisory (AV25-231)
description: On April 23, 2025, SonicWall published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: SonicOS Gen7 NSv: NSv 270, NSv 470 and NSv 870  version 7.1.1-7040 to 7.1.3-7015 (7.1.x only)
SonicOS Gen7 Firewalls: TZ270, TZ270W, TZ370, TZ370W, TZ470, TZ470W, TZ570 and TZ570W  version 7.1.1-7040 to 7.1.3-7015 (7.1.x only)
SonicOS TZ570P, TZ670, NSa 2700, NSa 3700, NSa 4700, NSa 5700, NSa 6700, NSsp 10700, NSsp 11700, NSsp 13700 and NSsp 15700  version 7.1.1-7040 to 7.1.3-7015 (7.1.x only)
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
